description: Welcome to Crofton! This bright end-unit townhome offers 4 beds, 4 baths, and 2,092 sq.ft. of high-quality construction and finishings. Enjoy NO GST and low strata fees of only $196.69! Main level features wide-plank laminate flooring, large windows, and a beautiful feature wall w/electric fireplace & built-ins. Chef-inspired kitchen includes two-tone shaker cabinets, a quartz waterfall island, LG stainless steel appliances, and a gas range. Perfect for entertaining! Upstairs, a huge luxurious primary bedroom with WIC and a spa-inspired ensuite w/double sinks, oversized glass shower, and soaker tub. Two additional bedrooms & full bath. Lower-level bedroom w/ensuite provides the perfect space for guests or office. Features central A/C, on-demand HW, a fenced yard, and a double garage!
